sentences.sentence: This experience shall surmount all that you have so far partaken of.
sentences.translation: 这次经历会超越你们至今为止所经历的一切。

sentences.sentence: She spoke uncomplainingly of the arduous duties of which she had partaken.
sentences.translation: 她毫无怨言地讲述了她所分担的艰巨任务。

sentences.sentence: Then, I will read the words in silence after I have partaken of my midday meal.
sentences.translation: 我有时间吃的时候，就吃一顿丰盛的午餐。
